original_text: But the eyes of the wicked shall fail, and they shall not escape, and their hope shall be as the giving up of the ghost.
korean_text: 그러나 악한 자들은 눈이 어두워서 도망할 곳을 찾지 못하리니 그들의 희망은 숨을 거두는 것이니라

sentences.original_text: But the eyes of the wicked shall fail
and their hope shall be as the giving up of the ghost
